mapper.insert: INSERT INTO expert(expertNum, userId, name, content, created, hitCount, groupNum, orderNo, depth) VALUES (#{expertNum}, #{userId}, #{name}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 0, #{groupNum}, #{orderNo}, #{depth})
mapper.select:
SELECT expertNum, userId, name, content, created, hitCount, groupNum, orderNo, depth FROM expert
ORDER BY groupNum DESC, orderNo ASC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
